title: Racist Intentional Feeder

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
WeHateAsians - this is the name of an intensional feeder that has been feeding for over 6 months in bronze 5 OCE, and because of the lack of tribuneral in OCE he has been able to do it for over 6 months without permaban or problem from riot, this player has trolled in so many games and so much so I had to take the time to write this so you would notice, check his stats and chat log if you dont believe me.

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/NA/38229549

replies.body:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules

You're much better off submitting this as a support ticket. It's not like we can ban him or anything.

First "Name and shame policy"
Second non rioters can't check chat logs
third best you can do is ignore them until tribunal does something just keep reporting after a spike of reports the player will have a ban from what i've read

This guy is on all the time 24/7 The amount of games myself and others have lost because of him is uncountable, he is now widely recognised by at least someone in each game. For Example just from being trolled by him so much I know that he plays Fiora or Garen top lane when he trolls, he takes Tp to speed up the feeding and wont buy a single item until late game where he may start attacking the enemy while feeding. 

He starts every game with a spam of something along the lines of "My Name is WeHateAsians and i will troll if everyone doesn't say the word penis 1/5" He will change this as time goes on such as recently he has added that he is from perth Australia in message each time. If all 5 people dont say penis he will troll the game. He often does this effortlessly and plays games such as Final Fantasy while his character seems to feed on a Macro. 

In short the guy doesn't feel any strain by doing this or any enjoyment since hes not even playing any attention while feeding, he just does it because he can and its been like this for months now with everyone taking every chance they can to report him. 

pls riot can you do something about this guy

Simply looking at his profile verifies everything ive said http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=WeHateAsians

riot staff are paid to work but apparently they are paid to rest.
Can't see any positive outcome regarding the elimination of intentionally troll trash or mentally retarded players in this game.
Only advice is start over a new account and play ranked seriously, although silver and gold are full of trash and trolls as well, the situation is not as bad as in bronze
